Plot: When a college piano prodigy tries to check his mother into rehab, he is taken hostage by her drug dealer and swept along on a wild adventure.
Title: Why Stop Now?
Writer: Phil Dorling (written for the screen by), Ron Nyswaner (written for the screen by), Phil Dorling (source material: 'Predisposed',  a short film written by), Ron Nyswaner (source material: 'Predisposed',  a short film written by)
Actors: Jesse Eisenberg, Melissa Leo, Tracy Morgan, Emma Rayne Lyle
